name: SyntyBricks
summary: Enter the immersive world of our VR game inspired by the classic DX-Ball! Armed with a racket and balls, players will engage in a tennis-like gameplay experience. Crush the bricks, test your reflexes, and aim for high scores as you embark on a thrilling journey through various challenging levels. Get ready for an addictive VR adventure that combines nostalgia with cutting-edge technology
